name: HayWire (HackTrout)
description:
"Oh no! You're targeting system is broken and at the worst time too. Why? It's your annual inspection and you know what happens to defective robots!"

This is a top down shooter and the mechanic I chose to remove was the ability to aim! Instead of aiming you randomly twist and turn your gun, you've gone Haywire!

Sorry this is only for windows users***, the standard edition of GameMaker doesn't allow you to port games to android, Mac OX or IOS.

Programs used:

  • GameMaker Studio 1.4
  • Bosca Ceoil
  • GraphicsGale
  • Bfxr

Controls:

  • "Q" to zoom. NOT remappable in game.
  • Arrow keys to move. Remappable in game.
  • "F" key to shoot. Remappable in game.
  • Enter key to select menu options. Remappable in game.
  • Escape key to activate menu in game. Remappable in game.
